body:
Comment 1: 
I added regular pings to my ssh client, and still my connection is closed due to
inactivity.

Also, my server is configured as 

# Send an alive messages every 30 seconds, and disconnect after 10 minutes.
ClientAliveInterval 30
ClientAliveCountMax 20

so the connection should be kept alive. While keepalive might be nice, my real problem
is a deadlock in the code, which is https://golang.org/issue/5877
